meanings.definition: To attach or fasten with sellotape.
meanings.sent1: She was sellotaping the poster to the wall.
meanings.sent2: I always sellotape my notes to the fridge.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought sellotaping its toy to the ceiling was a great idea.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like sellotaping my heart together after a breakup.
meanings.sent5: The sound of sellotaping echoed through the room, sealing the box shut.

meanings.definition: The act of using sellotape to stick things together.
meanings.sent1: He ran out of sellotaping for his project.
meanings.sent2: The sellotaping on the gift was neatly done.
meanings.sent3: The sellotaping on the costume made it look like a sellotape superhero.
meanings.sent4: The friendship was the sellotaping that held the group together.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was filled with the smell of fresh sellotaping.
